purpose: To provide enriched vulnerability scoring by integrating Temporal and Threat Metrics into the standard CVSS framework.
principle: Utilizes Python to process and enhance CVSS data with additional metrics, potentially leveraging data from the National Vulnerability Database (NVD).
reusability: Can be integrated into security assessment workflows to provide more nuanced vulnerability scores; potential for API-based integration.
limitations: Dependent on the accuracy and completeness of underlying CVSS and NVD data; may not cover all possible threat scenarios.
name: cvss-bt
description: Enriching the NVD CVSS scores to include Temporal & Threat Metrics
highlight: Enhances CVSS scores with additional Temporal and Threat Metrics for more comprehensive vulnerability assessment.
